Study.Citation:
Elphinston, R.A., Feeney, J.A., and Noller, P. (2011). Measuring
romantic jealousy: Validation of the multidimensional jealousy scale
in Australian samples. Australian Journal of Psychology, 63, 243-251. Open access link

License.en: Freely available for research purposes (verify with original publication)
License.de: Frei verfügbar für Forschungszwecke (mit Originalpublikation überprüfen)

Instructions.en: Please read each statement and select the response that best describes you.
Instructions.de: Bitte lesen Sie jede Aussage und wählen Sie die Antwort, die Sie am besten beschreibt.

Description.en: I suspect that X is secretly seeing someone of the opposite sex.
Description.de: I suspect that X is secretly seeing someone of the opposite sex.

Description.en: I suspect that X may be attracted to someone else.
Description.de: I suspect that X may be attracted to someone else.

Description.en: I suspect that X may be physically intimate with another member of the opposite sex behind my back.
Description.de: I suspect that X may be physically intimate with another member of the opposite sex behind my back.

Description.en: I think that X is secretly developing an intimate relationship with someone of the opposite sex.
Description.de: I think that X is secretly developing an intimate relationship with someone of the opposite sex.

Description.en: I suspect that X is crazy about members of the opposite sex.
Description.de: I suspect that X is crazy about members of the opposite sex.
